affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 105/120/140/165
COOLDOWN: 8
desc: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
notes: Can hit units up to 1110 range away.
lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.
name: death_prophet_carrion_swarm

cmb:
MANA COST: 80/80/80/80
COOLDOWN: 15
desc: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.
name: death_prophet_silence

attrib:
MOVEMENT SPEED: 5% / 10% / 15% / 20%
MANA COST DECREASE: 10 / 15 / 20 / 25
COOLDOWN DECREASE: 1 / 2 / 3 / 4
EXORCISM SPIRITS: 3 / 4 / 5 / 6
desc: Increases the potency of Death Prophet's spells, while providing a passive movement speed boost.  Reduces mana costs and cooldowns of Crypt Swarm and Silence, and adds additional spirits to Exorcism.
lore: With each death, Krobelus adds necromantic power to her repertoire.
name: death_prophet_witchcraft

attrib:
RADIUS: 700 / 700 / 700
SPIRITS: 4 / 12 / 21
LIFE DRAIN: 25% / 25% / 25%
SPIRIT DAMAGE: 55 / 55 / 55
cmb:
MANA COST: 200/300/400
COOLDOWN: 145
desc: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 30 seconds.
notes:
Radius represents the area in which the spirits will acquire targets around Death Prophet.
Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.
lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.
name: death_prophet_exorcism
